answers.answer: what are your BG numbers?  high BG can cause excessive urination. but NOT needing to pee and not being able to.go get checked out
It could also be a urinary tract infection.Regardless, check your blood sugar levels, and get checked for a UTI.

question: For three days now I have been having to urinate a lot. To the point that my lower abs feel like they have pressure on them. At first I was peeing so much and now I just feel like I have to pee when I dont. Nothing has changed from my day to day routine so I am not sure if this is a complication from my diabetes or if it is from something else.
title: Anyone know if this is diabetic related?
